message.content:
cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.CR, cs.CV, cs.AI 

This paper discusses the use of control theory to defend against adversarial attacks on neural networks. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.SY (Systems and Control), as the paper specifically mentions the use of Lyapunov control theory. The paper also touches on topics related to computer security (cs.CR), computer vision (cs.CV), and artificial intelligence (cs.AI), which are all relevant to the study of adversarial attacks.
